title: League of Legends crashes my pc
body: This has happened multiple times while i am in games. My monitor, keyboard, and mouse will all get disconnected (by disconnected i mean my screen is totally black) but my pc will still be running. I have a GTX 1050ti with up to date driver from nvidia and i monitored my temp of my cpu and gpu both never went up higher than 40C. I kind of narrowed down the problem to the gpu but for the exact problem i have no ideas. Also i tested running other games like DOOM, Rainbow6 siege, and other triple A games and they all ran fine for hours without any problem. The only game i have problem with is League...

replies.body: Are your control only disconnected in game, or can you task out?  When you get this black screen are you able to see the game?  It sounds like your drivers are failing, so just to help rule out possibilities, I highly recommend going over each step of our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Let me know the results!
